title: Define System Architecture for Distributed In-Memory Database
description: Outline the design and structure of the distributed in-memory database system, including data structures, communication protocols, and consistency mechanisms.

title: Define Project Requirements and Goals (Revised)
description: Provide a comprehensive outline of the objectives for the DistributedGenomeSequencingPipeline. Objectives include: clear performance expectations (e.g., processing speed, memory requirements), scalability requirements (e.g., number of nodes, horizontal scaling strategies), input/output formats (e.g., FASTQ, VCF), expected results (e.g., genomic variants, gene annotations), and any additional specifications or considerations (e.g., data security, error handling).

title: Implement Key-Value Storage System Prototype
description: Write the initial code implementing the key-value storage system.
dependencies: Design Key-Value Storage System for In-Memory Database

title: Develop Communication Protocol for Node Coordination
description: Create a communication protocol that allows the distributed nodes to coordinate effectively and maintain data consistency.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Distributed In-Memory Database

title: Implement Communication Protocol for Node Coordination
description: Write the code implementing the developed communication protocol.
dependencies: Develop Communication Protocol for Node Coordination

title: Write Unit Tests for Key-Value Storage System
description: Create unit tests to verify the correct functionality of the key-value storage system.

title: Write Unit Tests for Communication Protocol
description: Create unit tests to verify the correct functionality of the communication protocol.
dependencies: Implement Communication Protocol for Node Coordination

title: Write User Documentation for Distributed In-Memory Database
description: Create user documentation explaining the features, usage, and setup process of the distributed in-memory database.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Distributed In-Memory Database

title: Perform Security Review of Distributed In-Memory Database Design
description: Review the design and architecture of the distributed in-memory database to identify potential security vulnerabilities.
dependencies: Define System Architecture for Distributed In-Memory Database
